title: Season 1
overview: Piper must trade her comfortable New York life for an orange prison jumpsuit when her decade-old relationship with a drug runner catches up with her.

episodes.title: I Wasn't Ready
episodes.overview: Sentenced to fifteen months for a crime committed in her youth, Piper Chapman leaves her supportive fiance Larry for her new home: a women's prison.

episodes.title: Tit Punch
episodes.overview: After insulting the food in front of the prison chef, Piper is starved out by the kitchen staff and struggles to offer up an acceptable apology.

episodes.title: Lesbian Request Denied
episodes.overview: Targeted for romance by a fellow prisoner, Piper finds that subtlety is an ineffective approach to letting her suitor down.

episodes.title: Imaginary Enemies
episodes.overview: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate; the prisoners prepare a farewell party for one of their own; a misplaced screwdriver has dire consequences.

episodes.title: The Chickening
episodes.overview: When her sighting of a legendary feral chicken polarizes the inmates, Larry wonders if Piper is getting too absorbed in the "fishbowl" of prison life.

episodes.title: WAC Pack
episodes.overview: The inmates campaign along racial lines for positions on a prisoners council, but Piper tries to stay above the increasingly raucous competition.

episodes.title: Blood Donut
episodes.overview: Piper wants the prison's outdoor running track reopened, but in order to get it, she'll have to give her corrections officer something he wants.

episodes.title: Moscow Mule
episodes.overview: Red gets pressured to smuggle drugs through her kitchen; Larry publishes an article about Piper in the "New York Times;" two babies come into the world.

episodes.title: Fucksgiving
episodes.overview: Thanksgiving arrives with the promise of a visit by Larry, but Piper's raunchy dance moves land her in solitary with a holiday feast of moldy bologna.

episodes.title: Bora Bora Bora
episodes.overview: Pennsatucky discovers a new skill; the inmates try to scare delinquent teenagers straight; Pornstache's side business suffers a tragic setback.

episodes.title: Tall Men with Feelings
episodes.overview: The prisoners mourn one of their own and even a drunken Pornstache reveals surprising emotions; Larry gives a revealing radio interview.

episodes.title: Fool Me Once
episodes.overview: Painful truths reorient several relationships and careers; Pennsatucky feels disrespected by Piper, which is not good; Larry delivers an ultimatum.

episodes.title: Can't Fix Crazy
episodes.overview: Red's scheme to reclaim her kitchen backfires; the inmates stage a Christmas pageant; Piper's plans unravel even as she realizes her life is in jeopardy.

title: Season 2
overview: Shocking revelations and new arrivals shake up the lives and relationships of Litchfield's prisoners.

episodes.title: Thirsty Bird
episodes.overview: Piper's world is turned upside down when she is forced to confront the consequences of her actions and face new challenges.

episodes.title: Looks Blue, Tastes Red
episodes.overview: A mock Job Fair provides Taystee with a chance to show off her business smarts; Red feels isolated from her prison family.

episodes.title: Hugs Can Be Deceiving
episodes.overview: Piper is challenged by her Soso experience; Morello gets her heart broken; a figure from Taystee's past arrives to disturb the status quo.

episodes.title: A Whole Other Hole
episodes.overview: Sophia gives the women a much-needed lesson in female anatomy; Morello takes a detour; Larry makes some life changes.

episodes.title: Low Self Esteem City
episodes.overview: A bathroom turf war sees deeper lines drawn in the sand as Gloria and Vee go head to head. Piper receives devastating news.

episodes.title: You Also Have a Pizza
episodes.overview: Love is in the air as the inmates prepare for a Valentine's Day party; Red makes an intriguing new discovery. Larry asks Piper to be his prison mole.

episodes.title: Comic Sans
episodes.overview: Piper starts a prison newsletter with the help of Healy and a few other inmates; Vee launches an entrepreneurial enterprise.

episodes.title: Appropriately Sized Pots
episodes.overview: Piper faces a new backlash over special privileges; Caputo feels pressure to toughen up, resulting in administrative changes.

episodes.title: 40 Oz. of Furlough
episodes.overview: Piper's relationship with Larry faces a real-world test; Red's effort to redeem herself is finally rewarded. A familiar figure returns to Litchfield.

episodes.title: Little Mustachioed Shit
episodes.overview: The guards get tougher in a bid to turn up prison contraband; a big, lingering secret is finally revealed.

episodes.title: Take a Break from Your Values
episodes.overview: Piper is shocked at an unexpected change in her status; Soso's hunger strike attracts new support that takes on a religious fervor.

episodes.title: It Was the Change
episodes.overview: Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light. Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

episodes.title: We Have Manners. We're Polite.
episodes.overview: Several futures hang in the balance as the inmates face and confront their worst nightmares: Life will never be the same again.

title: Season 3
overview: New business interests, spiritual movements and parental problems upend lives and ignite power struggles among Litchfield's residents and guards.

episodes.title: Mother's Day
episodes.overview: Caputo's kinder, gentler new regime includes organizing a Mother's Day fair for the inmates that brings up a LOT of mixed feelings about family.

episodes.title: Bed Bugs and Beyond
episodes.overview: Tempers flare when bed bugs invade. Alex cracks. Red lashes out at Piper. Aleida interferes with Daya and Bennett. Caputo gets bad news.

episodes.title: Empathy Is a Boner Killer
episodes.overview: Nicky's stash situation gets complicated. Alex and Crazy Eyes try a new drama class. Red assists Healy with a personal matter.

episodes.title: Finger in the Dyke
episodes.overview: Big Boo comes up with a scheme to make money. Daya, Taystee and Crazy Eyes confront reality. Caputo tries to make a good impression on some visitors.

episodes.title: Fake It Till You Fake It Some More
episodes.overview: Rumors fly among the inmates about a new, higher-paying job assignment, especially when they have to take a test for it

episodes.title: Ching Chong Chang
episodes.overview: Regime change isn't going over well with the staff, but Red makes it work for her. Lorna finds a way to meet men. Chang shows her private side.

episodes.title: Tongue-Tied
episodes.overview: Normas healing powers draw more believers. Piper creates a new business venture. Caputo breaks in the new hires.

episodes.title: Fear, and Other Smells
episodes.overview: Piper gets creative in order to grow her business. Crazy Eyess sci-fi sex story for drama class is a hit. Alex doesnt trust new inmate Lolly.

episodes.title: Where My Dreidel At
episodes.overview: Too many inmates seem to be getting religion, so a rabbi comes to visit. Leanne tries to organize Norma's followers.

episodes.title: A Tittin' and a Hairin'
episodes.overview: Pennsatucky, Piper, Crazy Eyes and Lorna get closer with their new admirers. Tensions between Sophia and Gloria, and Alex and Lolly escalate.

episodes.title: We Can Be Heroes
episodes.overview: Caputo and Piper confront labor issues. A miracle occurs in Norma's group. Crazy Eyes's erotica winds up in the hands of the staff.

episodes.title: Dont Make Me Come Back There
episodes.overview: Daya goes into labor. Sophia suffers a hate crime. Stella helps Piper with a business snag. Taystee takes on a new role.

episodes.title: Trust No Bitch
episodes.overview: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.

title: Season 4
overview: New faces and old resentments make for a potentially volatile blend, especially now that Litchfield is a for-profit business.

episodes.title: Work That Body for Me
episodes.overview: With a major security breach and a lot of new inmates, Caputo has to call in the big guns. Things get a little too real for Crazy Eyes and Lolly.

episodes.title: Power Suit
episodes.overview: The newcomers stir up ethnic and domestic conflicts, but Maria sees an opportunity. Judy's special treatment raises eyebrows.

episodes.title: (Don't) Say Anything
episodes.overview: A new job puts Taystee close to Caputo. Lorna has to get creative in her marriage. Soso and Poussey deal with some awkward truths.

episodes.title: Doctor Psycho
episodes.overview: Nothing stays hidden for long when emotions run high, but Red, Healy and Caputo try to keep the peace. Piper has a business competitor.

episodes.title: We'll Always Have Baltimore
episodes.overview: Company policies lead to a shortage of critical supplies and an eventful trip to a prison convention. Piscatella starts a new anti-gang initiative.

episodes.title: Piece of Sh*t
episodes.overview: Piper's plan to edge out the competition could backfire badly. Cindy finds a way to make Taystee's job pay off. Luschek gets some interesting mail.

episodes.title: It Sounded Nicer in My Head
episodes.overview: Paranoia strikes deep for Lolly and Judy, aggravating an already tense situation. Red sticks to a Russian tradition for an important occasion.

episodes.title: Friends in Low Places
episodes.overview: A new work detail doesn't go over well with the inmates. Judy seeks help from Poussey. Maria finds a place she can conduct business.

episodes.title: Turn Table Turn
episodes.overview: Ramos and Flores figure out ways to rebel against authority. A news item has an unexpected effect. Red and Lorna face personal disappointment.

episodes.title: Bunny, Skull, Bunny, Skull
episodes.overview: The movie night selection becomes controversial. Aleida makes an adjustment. Piper worries the prison punishments are getting medieval.

episodes.title: People Persons
episodes.overview: Caputo's leadership is challenged and the inmates are in for a long night of lockdown after workers make an unsettling discovery.

episodes.title: The Animals
episodes.overview: Alliances shift among the prison "families" as Piscatella and his guards crack down. Poussey, Judy and Alex prefer to look ahead to the future.

episodes.title: Toast Can't Never Be Bread Again
episodes.overview: Corporate bureaucracy and simmering anger work against Caputo's efforts to keep a sensitive situation under control.

title: Season 5
overview: The power dynamics at Litchfield shift dramatically as the inmates react to a tragedy in an explosive new season.

episodes.title: Riot FOMO
episodes.overview: As the standoff at the prison spirals into a full-blown riot, enterprising inmates take advantage of the confusion. Taystee confronts Caputo.

episodes.title: Fuck, Marry, Frieda
episodes.overview: Maria convenes a special assembly in the chapel as the inmates plot their next move. Frieda makes use of the survival skills she learned as a kid.

episodes.title: Pissters!
episodes.overview: Linda begins to see the prison in a new light, while Judy grows desperate to escape. With darkness falling, the inmates compile a list of demands.

episodes.title: Litchfield's Got Talent
episodes.overview: Red and Blanca dig for dirt on Piscatella. Suzanne conducts a sance. The guards show off their talents for "Litchfield Idol" judges Leanne and Angie.

episodes.title: Sing It, White Effie
episodes.overview: When the inmates' antics make the morning news, Flaca and Maritza soak up the spotlight. Brandy and her crew auction off Judy to the highest bidder.

episodes.title: Flaming Hot Cheetos, Literally
episodes.overview: Boo defends Doggett, Janae consoles Soso, and Lorna comes on to Nicky. While Alex lays low in the yard, Piper decides to take a stand.

episodes.title: Full Bush, Half Snickers
episodes.overview: Black Cindy concocts a scheme to distract Suzanne when she spirals out of control. Taystee and Piper search for ways to honor Poussey's memory.

episodes.title: Tied to the Traintracks
episodes.overview: While Taystee sits down with a negotiator, Red and Blanca put their own plan into action. Gloria counsels Daya and asks Caputo for a favor.

episodes.title: The Tightening
episodes.overview: Red senses trouble, but the others are convinced she's just paranoid. Taystee and Black Cindy enlist an unlikely ally, and two old friends clash.

episodes.title: The Reverse Midas Touch
episodes.overview: Taystee tries to keep the negotiations on track. Angie comes up with an idea for fixing Leanne's finger. Piscatella's past is revealed.

episodes.title: Breaking the Fiberboard Ceiling
episodes.overview: Red and the others weigh their options. Gloria wrestles with her conscience as she moves forward with a plan. Lorna takes over the pharmacy.

episodes.title: Tattoo You
episodes.overview: Boo dabbles in blackmail, Nicky promises to help Lorna, Doggett makes a discovery, and Piper comes to a realization about Alex.

episodes.title: Storm-y Weather
episodes.overview: As chaos descends on Litchfield three days into the riot, the inmates wonder what the future holds and seek solace in loved ones.

episodes.title: Who Knows Better Than I
episodes.overview: The COs at Litchfield's maximum security unit size up the new arrivals. Off her medication, Suzanne hallucinates.

episodes.title: Sh*tstorm Coming
episodes.overview: Ordered to hand out harsh sentences, the feds search for scapegoats. Languishing on paid suspension, Caputo tries to break out of a rut.

episodes.title: Look Out for Number One
episodes.overview: Linda makes a power play, Piper digs for information about Alex, and the women get their first taste of a decades-old feud between cellblocks.

episodes.title: I'm the Talking Ass
episodes.overview: Aleida struggles to find work on the outside. Backed into a corner, Nicky pleads her case to Red. Taystee reaches out to Caputo for help.

episodes.title: Mischief Mischief
episodes.overview: Pranksters wreak havoc on Halloween. Luschek earns points with the other guards. As Linda faces a crisis, Donuts and Pennsatucky have a change of plans.

episodes.title: State of the Uterus
episodes.overview: While Daddy deals with backlash, Badison plots revenge. Flaca finds a co-host for her radio show. Lorna discovers that pregnancy has its perks.

episodes.title: Changing Winds
episodes.overview: Badison hustles to get back in Carol's good graces. Blanca longs to get pregnant -- and Nicky has a plan. Caputo and Figueroa's relationship evolves.

episodes.title: Gordons
episodes.overview: Taystee gets fan mail -- and an assist from an old friend. Piper lobbies Luschek to bring back kickball. Aleida tries out a new sales tactic.

episodes.title: Break the String
episodes.overview: While Daddy buys time with Barb, Daya looks for new ways to bring in oxy. Black Cindy's guilt takes a toll on her body. Red acquires a powerful ally.

episodes.title: Chocolate Chip Nookie
episodes.overview: Aleida seizes a business opportunity. An anonymous tip sends Caputo on a stakeout. Luschek tries to help Gloria, who worries she's in danger.

episodes.title: Well This Took a Dark Turn
episodes.overview: While Red and Carol scheme against Frieda, Suzanne watches Frieda's back. Lorna swears her allegiance to Barb as Nicky works to thwart another plot.

episodes.title: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Carol and Barb prepare for war. Linda auditions inmates for a prison PR video. Alex makes a deal with Badison to keep Piper out of trouble.

episodes.title: Be Free
episodes.overview: Piper gets surprising news and a boost from her friends. The jury returns with a verdict, and the big kickball game is on.

episodes.title: Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: Piper struggles to adapt to life after Litchfield. Alex promises to keep her nose clean. Daddy's infidelity angers Daya.

episodes.title: Just Desserts
episodes.overview: Piper earns her keep by babysitting. Aleida pressures Hopper to go for a promotion. Random drug searches put the heat on Alex. Daya gets an offer.

episodes.title: And Brown Is the New Orange
episodes.overview: A new warden ushers in big changes. Blanca reunites with an old friend. Suzanne tries to mend Taystee and Black Cindy's relationship.

episodes.title: How to Do Life
episodes.overview: Piper goes to work for her dad. Vinnie visits Lorna with news. A desperate Taystee asks Daya for a favor. Caputo leads a restorative justice class.

episodes.title: Minority Deport
episodes.overview: Aleida tries to keep her teen daughter out of trouble. Piper and Cal shed their responsibilities for a day. Blanca navigates the legal system.

episodes.title: Trapped in an Elevator
episodes.overview: Taystee takes advantage of her new position. Linda teaches Tamika how to pivot. Black Cindy and Maria make amends to people they've hurt.

episodes.title: Me as Well
episodes.overview: Piper plays the field. Caputo tries to get ahead of a scandal. Daya sends Taystee on a mission. Nicky finds romance.

episodes.title: Baker's Dozen
episodes.overview: Neri takes Piper on a wilderness retreat. Taystee tutors Pennsatucky. Suzanne tends to the chicken coop. Nicky has a difficult conversation with Red.

episodes.title: The Hidey Hole
episodes.overview: Competition forces Daya to find a new mule. Piper decides to come out as a felon. Karla asks to leave for a custody hearing. Shani confides in Nicky.

episodes.title: The Thirteenth
episodes.overview: While Piper reconnects with faces from her past, Alex revisits her own romantic history. Linda puts Tamika on notice. Caputo owns up to his misdeeds.

episodes.title: God Bless America
episodes.overview: Maria tries to make peace with Gloria. Karla and Blanca plead their cases. Figueroa stands up to Litvack. Piper attends a posh fundraiser with Zelda.

episodes.title: The Big House
episodes.overview: Taystee meets with a lawyer. As the GED exam looms, Suzanne gives Pennsatucky a pep talk. Gloria faces a dilemma. Alex confronts Piper.

episodes.title: Here's Where We Get Off
episodes.overview: Tearful farewells, emotional tributes, new beginnings. Say goodbye to the women of Litchfield in the series finale.
